actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal recent increases in social security taxes.
short_title: Social Security Tax Reduction Act of 1991

summary.text: Social Security Tax Reduction Act of 1991 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce social security taxes for 1991 and thereafter.

titles.title: Social Security Tax Reduction Act of 1991
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal recent increases in social security taxes.
